textBox.richText: Buy iWeb Buddy and receive a coupon code for LicenseKeeper. For a limited time, we’re offering a 20% discount off LicenseKeeper when you purchase iWebBuddy. You’ll receive a secret coupon code with your registration that you can use towards a copy of LicenseKeeper. LicenseKeeper stores and organizes important software license information, helping to prevent the loss of valuable software assets and making it accessible when needed most. Automatic serial number scanning and software information detection greatly reduces cumbersome data entry. Attachments keep related email and documents safely archived along with license and registration records.
